title: Softr
description: Unlike the amazing AI agents and dev tools here, Softr won't improve your productivity, help you write better code, or bring any financial gains to your company. But hopefully it will bring a smile to your face when taking a break from the grind - by turning things around you into soft, adorable plushies! With Softr, you can turn anything into a plushie with AI. Upload a photo to experience the magic!
